All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActionCard
The ActionCard class represents a special card in the game that has an action associated with it, such as Skip or Reverse.
ButtonListener
The ButtonListener class handles button click events and performs actions such as drawing a card or saying UNO in the game.
Card
The abstract class Card represents a generic card in the game.
CardListener
The CardListener class is responsible for handling mouse events on the cards.
Constants
 
CPUPanel
CPUPanel is a custom JPanel that represents a CPU player's hand and status in the game.
CPUPlayer
The CPUPlayer class represents a computer-controlled player in the UNO game.
DealerShuffler
The DealerShuffler class is responsible for managing the deck of cards, shuffling them, and distributing them to players.
Deck
The Deck class represents a deck of UNO cards.
Game
Represents the main game logic and state for the UNO game.
Game.Direction
Enum representing the direction of play.
GameController
 
InfoPanel
InfoPanel is a custom JPanel that displays game information such as error messages, status messages, the number of remaining cards, and the current direction of play.
LeaderBoardWithStats
LeaderBoard_stats is a JFrame that displays the leaderboard of users.
LoadGameController
The LoadGameController class is responsible for loading a saved game from a file and setting up the game state accordingly.
LoginPage
LoginPage is a JFrame that provides the login interface for users.
Main
 
MainFrame
The MainFrame class represents the main window of the application.
MainMenu
 
NumberCard
The NumberCard class represents a numbered card in the UNO game.
Player
The Player class represents a player in the game, managing the player's cards, turn status, and actions.
PlayerPanel
The PlayerPanel class represents the panel for the human player, displaying the player's cards and control buttons (Draw and Say UNO).
ResultWindow
 
Rules
 
Session
The Session class represents the main game session panel for the UNO game.
SignUpPage
The SignUpPage class provides the GUI for the user registration.
TablePanel
The TablePanel class represents the game table panel in the UNO game.
UserCellRenderer
The UserCellRenderer class customizes the rendering of UserInfo objects in a JList.
UserFileHandler
The UserFileHandler class provides utility methods to handle user data stored in a text file.
UserInfo
The UserInfo class represents a user in the game, managing the user's nickname, password, wins, losses, total score, total games, and rank.
UserSession
The UserSession class manages the current user's session in the game.
UserStats
The UserStats class represents a window that displays statistics for a specific user.
UserStatsDialog
The UserStatsDialog class displays a dialog box with statistics for a specified user.
ViewCard
The ViewCard class represents a visual component for displaying a card in a card game.
WildCard
The WildCard class represents a wild card in the UNO game.
